outcomeDetails.plainText: Movie of the Year THE DARK KNIGHT leapt from the screen and into the zeitgeist of a nation desperate for a savior, ... More THE DARK KNIGHT leapt from the screen and into the zeitgeist of a nation desperate for a savior, but wary of the consequences of rushing to action. At once brave and bravura, this epic studio presentation succeeds as blockbuster entertainment and true artistic expression from Christopher Nolan, who devised the story with David S. Goyer and co-wrote the screenplay with his brother Jonathan. Christian Bale, Gary Oldman, Morgan Freeman, Aaron Eckhart, Michael Caine and Maggie Gyllenhaal lead a stellar cast marked forever in time by Heath Ledger's re-imagining of "The Joker." THE DARK KNIGHT is a movie that leaves your heart and mind racing as it redefines heroism for a new generation.
outcomeDetails.html:
Movie of the Year

THE DARK KNIGHT leapt from the screen and into the zeitgeist of a nation desperate for a savior, ... More

THE DARK KNIGHT leapt from the screen and into the zeitgeist of a nation desperate for a savior, but wary of the consequences of rushing to action. At once brave and bravura, this epic studio presentation succeeds as blockbuster entertainment and true artistic expression from Christopher Nolan, who devised the story with David S. Goyer and co-wrote the screenplay with his brother Jonathan. Christian Bale, Gary Oldman, Morgan Freeman, Aaron Eckhart, Michael Caine and Maggie Gyllenhaal lead a stellar cast marked forever in time by Heath Ledger's re-imagining of "The Joker." THE DARK KNIGHT is a movie that leaves your heart and mind racing as it redefines heroism for a new generation.

outcomeDetails.plainText: Best Fight Rob Cooper Richard Hansen Mark Mottram Andy Pilgrim Dominic Preece Marvin Campbell Buster Reeves Steen Young Batman fights bad guys in building construction site. Using wires Batman moves to a lower floor and... More Batman fights bad guys in building construction site. Using wires Batman moves to a lower floor and fights with hand to hand combat. The fight ends with five SWAT members being thrown off the side of the building.
outcomeDetails.html:
Best Fight Rob Cooper Richard Hansen Mark Mottram Andy Pilgrim Dominic Preece Marvin Campbell Buster Reeves Steen Young

Batman fights bad guys in building construction site. Using wires Batman moves to a lower floor and... More

Batman fights bad guys in building construction site. Using wires Batman moves to a lower floor and fights with hand to hand combat. The fight ends with five SWAT members being thrown off the side of the building.

outcomeDetails.plainText: Best Work With a Vehicle Rick Avery Richard Burden George Cottle Tobiasz Daszkiewicz James Fierro Terry Jackson Tom Lowell Rick Miller Jean-Pierre Goy Jim Wilkey Batman and Joker chase a police van through the streets of Gotham. Chase features police cars, SWAT... More Batman and Joker chase a police van through the streets of Gotham. Chase features police cars, SWAT vans, a tractor-trailer, Batmobile and Batman's motorcycle. Driving in narrow lanes on the streets below a raised freeway, the vehicles crash and explode. The chase ends with the tractor-trailer doing a forward end over end cannon turnover.
outcomeDetails.html:
Best Work With a Vehicle Rick Avery Richard Burden George Cottle Tobiasz Daszkiewicz James Fierro Terry Jackson Tom Lowell Rick Miller Jean-Pierre Goy Jim Wilkey

Batman and Joker chase a police van through the streets of Gotham. Chase features police cars, SWAT... More

Batman and Joker chase a police van through the streets of Gotham. Chase features police cars, SWAT vans, a tractor-trailer, Batmobile and Batman's motorcycle. Driving in narrow lanes on the streets below a raised freeway, the vehicles crash and explode. The chase ends with the tractor-trailer doing a forward end over end cannon turnover.

outcomeDetails.plainText: Best High Work Mark Harper Luke Kearney Tom Lowell Mark Mottram Brian Peters Five stunt men are thrown out of a building by Batman. The stunt men use a slide to eject ... More Five stunt men are thrown out of a building by Batman. The stunt men use a slide to eject themselves from the 420' building while all attached to one common line as well as separate cables attached to individual deceleration devices.
outcomeDetails.html:
Best High Work Mark Harper Luke Kearney Tom Lowell Mark Mottram Brian Peters

Five stunt men are thrown out of a building by Batman. The stunt men use a slide to eject ... More

Five stunt men are thrown out of a building by Batman. The stunt men use a slide to eject themselves from the 420' building while all attached to one common line as well as separate cables attached to individual deceleration devices.

AFI Awards, USA (2009)

Winner
AFI Award

Movie of the Year

THE DARK KNIGHT leapt from the screen and into the zeitgeist of a nation desperate for a savior, ... More

THE DARK KNIGHT leapt from the screen and into the zeitgeist of a nation desperate for a savior, but wary of the consequences of rushing to action. At once brave and bravura, this epic studio presentation succeeds as blockbuster entertainment and true artistic expression from Christopher Nolan, who devised the story with David S. Goyer and co-wrote the screenplay with his brother Jonathan. Christian Bale, Gary Oldman, Morgan Freeman, Aaron Eckhart, Michael Caine and Maggie Gyllenhaal lead a stellar cast marked forever in time by Heath Ledger's re-imagining of "The Joker." THE DARK KNIGHT is a movie that leaves your heart and mind racing as it redefines heroism for a new generation.

World Stunt Awards (2009)

Winner
Taurus Award

Best Fight Rob Cooper Richard Hansen Mark Mottram Andy Pilgrim Dominic Preece Marvin Campbell Buster Reeves Steen Young

Batman fights bad guys in building construction site. Using wires Batman moves to a lower floor and... More

Batman fights bad guys in building construction site. Using wires Batman moves to a lower floor and fights with hand to hand combat. The fight ends with five SWAT members being thrown off the side of the building.

Best Work With a Vehicle Rick Avery Richard Burden George Cottle Tobiasz Daszkiewicz James Fierro Terry Jackson Tom Lowell Rick Miller Jean-Pierre Goy Jim Wilkey

Batman and Joker chase a police van through the streets of Gotham. Chase features police cars, SWAT... More

Batman and Joker chase a police van through the streets of Gotham. Chase features police cars, SWAT vans, a tractor-trailer, Batmobile and Batman's motorcycle. Driving in narrow lanes on the streets below a raised freeway, the vehicles crash and explode. The chase ends with the tractor-trailer doing a forward end over end cannon turnover.

Best High Work Mark Harper Luke Kearney Tom Lowell Mark Mottram Brian Peters

Five stunt men are thrown out of a building by Batman. The stunt men use a slide to eject ... More

Five stunt men are thrown out of a building by Batman. The stunt men use a slide to eject themselves from the 420' building while all attached to one common line as well as separate cables attached to individual deceleration devices.

Best Speciality Stunt Jim Wilkey

Stunt man drives a semi and does a large forward cannon flipping the tractor and trailer end over ... More

Stunt man drives a semi and does a large forward cannon flipping the tractor and trailer end over end.
